dn8:22.16_0: pasannākārañca karonti; no ca kho tathattāya paṭipajjanti …pe…
dn8:22.17_0: tathattāya ca paṭipajjanti; no ca kho paṭipannā ārādhentī’ti.
dn8:22.19_10: paṭipannā ca ārādhentī’ti evamassu, kassapa, vacanīyā.
dn8:23.1_0: Ekamidāhaṁ, kassapa, samayaṁ rājagahe viharāmi gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
dn8:23.2_0: Tatra maṁ aññataro tapabrahmacārī nigrodho nāma adhijegucche pañhaṁ apucchi.
dn8:23.4_0: Byākate ca pana me attamano ahosi paraṁ viya mattāyā”ti.
dn8:23.5_0: “Ko hi, bhante, bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā na attamano assa paraṁ viya mattāya?
dn8:23.6_0: Ahampi hi, bhante, bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā attamano paraṁ viya mattāya.
dn8:23.9_0: Esāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi, dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
dn8:23.10_0: Labheyyāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
dn8:24.1_4: catunnaṁ māsānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti,
dn8:24.3_4: catunnaṁ māsānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti,
dn8:24.3_7: catunnaṁ vassānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājentu,
dn8:24.4_0: Alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
dn8:24.5_0: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā kassapo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva—yassatthāya
dn8:24.5_2: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
dn8:24.6_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
dn8:24.7_0: Aññataro kho panāyasmā kassapo arahataṁ ahosīti.
